channel.title: Christmas on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Christmas on ZooBerry

item.title: Bench Pack
item.description: A pack of four benches for your zoo.

item.title: Christmas Scenery Pack
item.description: Christmas Scenery Pack featuring fountains, gazebos, and more.

item.title: Christmas Fountain
item.description: A colorful fountain for Christmas exhibits.

item.title: Christmas Trashcan
item.description: A festive trashcan for Christmas exhibits.

item.title: Christmas Tiger
item.description: A seasonal tiger for winter exhibits.

item.title: Falling Snow
item.description: An emitter that creates falling snow and functions as a tour item.

item.title: The Christmas Pack
item.description: Merry Christmas! The Christmas Pack is a collection of mods for Zoo Tycoon 2 that expound a winter theme.

item.title: The Christmas Pack 2: 7 Reasons to Celebrate
item.description: Merry Christmas! The Christmas Pack - 7 Reasons to Celebrate is the sequel to the collection of mods for Zoo Tycoon 2 that expound a winter theme.

item.title: Winter Kirin
item.description: The Winter Kirin is labeled as Critically Endangered not because it is threatened, but because all traces of them disappear off the face of the planet after the month of December.

item.title: Presently-Seated Bench
item.description: Download the Presently Seated Bench, a festive holiday bench

item.title: Winter Forest Sign
item.description: A decorative sign that is weathered by winter’s harshness and winter’s beauty; it comes in three variants and matches well with winter scenes.
